Package deco2800.arcade.pong

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIPaddle  
    Ball
    A basic implementation of the ball class, responsible for the behaviour of the ball including movement, bouncing, dimensions and positioning
    LocalUserPaddle
    Takes user input for paddle in pong.
    NetworkPaddle
    The network paddle receives events from the server about the position of the network player's paddle, and whether or not they have successfully bounced the ball.
    Paddle
    A basic implementation of a Paddle for the pong game.
    Pong
    A Pong game for use in the Arcade
